name: AthensSermonAudios
0:
”Alexa, open Athens Sermon Audios”
”Alexa, ask Athens Sermon Audios for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Athens Sermon Audios”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: athens sermon audios
des: Listen to the latest sermon audios from the A U L C Ministries. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". For more sermon audios, visit our web site at w w w dot a u l c dot u s
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
